import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Signup() { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ firstname: "", email: "", password: "", lastname: "" }); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/createuser", { method: "POST", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ firstname: credentials.firstname, email: credentials.email, password: credentials.password, lastname: credentials.lastname }) }); const json = await response.json(); console.log(json); if (!json.success) { alert("Enter Valid Credentials"); } // Handle response data as needed }; const onChange = (event) => { setCredentials({ ...credentials, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } return (

Enter your details to register

Already have an account? Sign in

) }
